akn:content.akn:p: Upon motion made within 90 days after the movant receives notice of the award pursuant to ยง 16-4419 or within 90 days after the movant receives notice of a modified or corrected award pursuant to ยง 16-4420, the court shall modify or correct the award if:

If a motion made under subsection (a) of this section is granted, the court shall modify or correct and confirm the award as modified or corrected. Otherwise, unless a motion to vacate is pending, the court shall confirm the award.
A motion to modify or correct an award pursuant to this section may be joined with a motion to vacate the award.

Irrespective of the time periods established in subsection (a) of this section and ยง 16-4423(c), a consumer may also seek to modify or vacate an award issued pursuant to a consumer arbitration agreement within 30 days of receiving notice of a motion to confirm the award.
